frontmatter.title: Roadmap
frontmatter.meta_title: MStore Multi Vendor - Complete React Native template for WooCommerce
frontmatter.meta_description: You are shop-owners of physical stores with high-traffic consumers and think to go digital. Or you are online shop-owners with E-Commerce websites. Both of you want to maximize sale opportunities.  You are developers who are challenged to develop store mobile application in a shorter time.  You question how can MStore help. Here are your answers.

markdownRemark.html:
We will update the list of support feature and detail change logs for every update on this page

Available features:

v1.0

  • Multi payment gateway (work with 99% your payment gateway)
  • Multi language support (include RTL), also support WPML.
  • Registration with Wordpress User and Social account.
  • Support Rating and comment on products.
  • Basic of e-commerce features: My Order, Wishlist, Shipping, Coupon, Billing Address, Checkout, My Order, support Product variant.
  • Integrate with your existing Wordpress/WooCommerce/Dokan with ease (no extra customization)
  • Easy whilte-label your app by few step to update the config, color, images, language files.
  • Instant search by Angola (advance features)
  • Flexible filter by category and multi product layout display
  • 4 type of side menu and varies layout homepage styles.
  • Push notification via website
  • Currency switcher support.
  • Work well on both iOS and Android with native like perfromance.

Blacklog

  • Add Vendor Features
  • Integrate with WCLover
